text: Dracaena (romanized form of the Greek δράκαινα - drakaina, "female dragon") can mean: *Drakaina (mythology), a Greek mythological entity *Dracaena (plant), a genus of plants *Cordyline australis, a plant commonly known as the Dracaena palm *Dracaena (lizard), a genus of lizard *Dracena, a town in Brazil *Dracaena, a fictional dragon-woman in Percy Jackson & the Olympians *Drakaina (model) (born 1975), a French actress and model. ==See also== * * * * *Dragon (disambiguation) *Draco (disambiguation) *Drago (disambiguation) Category:Genus disambiguation pages
title: Dracaena
